testcase.name: VIR-261.01 Verify that the subtotal is shown to the customer on the cart
VIR-261.02 Verify that the proper subtotal is shown, that depends on
VIR-261.03 Verify that the shopper can select any of the 4 delivery methods
VIR-261.04 Verify that the subtotal is changed accordingly if delivery method is changed
VIR-261.05 Verify that the subtotal is changed accordingly if contract is changed
